item.title: Josh add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Definition of rock journalism: People who can't write, doing interviews with people who can't think, in order to prepare articles for people who can't read." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Josh add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "There is more stupidity than hydrogen in the universe, and it has a longer shelf life." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Josh add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "All the good music has already been written by people with wigs and stuff." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Josh add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Josh add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Josh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Josh add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Josh add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Josh add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't want to achieve immortality through my work; I want to achieve immortality through not dying. I don't want to live on in the hearts of my countrymen; I want to live on in my apartment." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Josh add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "If Jesus came back and saw what was being done in his name, he'd never stop throwing up." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Josh add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Josh add a quote by kurt vonnegut
item.description: "If I should ever die, God forbid, let this be my epitaph: THE ONLY PROOF HE NEEDED FOR THE EXISTENCE OF GOD WAS MUSIC" -- kurt vonnegut
